类 MdStatusBar

extends java.lang.Object
    状态栏和导航栏 操作工具类 https://github.com/Zackratos/UltimateBar Created by github on 18/3/14.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setColorBar

        public static void setColorBar(android.app.Activity act,
                               int statusColor,
                               int statusDepth,
                               boolean applyNav,
                               int navColor,
                               int navDepth)
        自定义 状态栏和导航栏 的颜色
        参数:
        statusColor - StatusBar color
        statusDepth - StatusBar color depth
        applyNav - apply NavigationBar or no
        navColor - NavigationBar color (applyNav == true)
        navDepth - NavigationBar color depth (applyNav = true)

      • setTransparentBar

        public static void setTransparentBar(android.app.Activity act,
                                     int statusColor,
                                     int statusAlpha,
                                     boolean applyNav,
                                     int navColor,
                                     int navAlpha)
        设置 状态栏和导航栏 的 透明度
        参数:
        statusColor - StatusBar color
        statusAlpha - StatusBar alpha
        applyNav - apply NavigationBar or no
        navColor - NavigationBar color (applyNav == true)
        navAlpha - NavigationBar alpha (applyNav == true)
